metadata.title: Q-Solutions | Indoor Air Quality Management
metadata.description: Real-time air quality monitoring with AIoT sensors and scientific infection risk analysis for safer indoor environments.

hero.title: Is Your Space
hero.description: We analyze invisible airborne risks in real-time and create safe indoor environments with scientific data.

problem.title: We spend 90% of our day indoors.
problem.description: Fine dust, CO2, airborne bacteria... invisible threats are affecting your health.

infection.title: Airborne Infection Risk
infection.description: Respiratory diseases spread rapidly in enclosed spaces. Infection risk increases up to 10 times with poor ventilation.

productivity.title: Reduced Focus & Productivity
productivity.description: When CO2 levels exceed 1,000ppm, drowsiness and headaches occur, and cognitive ability can drop by up to 50%.

health.title: Chronic Health Issues
health.description: Long-term exposure to polluted air increases the risk of respiratory diseases, allergies, and cardiovascular conditions.

scientific.title: SCIENTIFIC
scientific.subtitle: Scientific Analysis
scientific.description: Wells-Riley model-based infection probability calculation and space-specific risk analysis

realtime.title: REAL-TIME
realtime.subtitle: Real-time Monitoring
realtime.description: 24/7 continuous measurement to instantly detect air quality changes and send alerts

automated.title: AUTOMATED
automated.subtitle: Automated Control
automated.description: AI-based automatic ventilation and HVAC system integration for optimal environment

proven.title: PROVEN
proven.subtitle: Proven Results
proven.description: Average 90% bacteria reduction and 15% energy savings at client facilities

public.title: Public Facilities
public.subtitle: Scientific management for spaces where citizens gather
public.description: Comprehensive management solution optimized for public facilities, from regulatory compliance to citizen assurance services

education.title: Schools & Education
education.subtitle: Is the classroom where your child studies safe?
education.description: Classroom environment management for student health and focus, with parent assurance reports

laboratory.title: Laboratories
laboratory.subtitle: Protecting researchers with data
laboratory.description: Real-time hazardous material detection and automatic warning systems to safely protect research environments

bacteria.label: Average Bacteria Reduction
bacteria.description: Total airborne bacteria at client facilities

energy.label: Energy Cost Savings
energy.description: HVAC cost reduction through optimal ventilation

hospital.title: Changwon Hospital Pediatrics
hospital.quote: After installing the infection control system, total airborne bacteria decreased to 1/10.

school.title: Seoul Elementary School
school.quote: Thanks to ventilation timing alerts, winter cold outbreaks noticeably decreased.

office.title: Gyeongnam Government Office
office.quote: Both visitors and staff can now work in a comfortable environment.

cta.title: Get Started Today
cta.description: Check the current state of your space with a free air quality assessment. Our experts will recommend customized solutions.

company.name: Q-Solutions
company.description: Indoor air quality management experts with AIoT sensor technology

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Leave us a message for a free assessment or service inquiry. We'll get back to you shortly.
